content.question: Which of the following could be the graph of a solution of the differential equation <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals open parenthesis, x minus 1, close parenthesis, times y squared" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></math> near the point <math alttext="with coordinates 1 comma 1" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></math> ?

choices.label: The figure shows the graph of a curve in the first quadrant of the x y coordinate plane, with origin labeled O. The number 1 is shown on both axes. The curve moves upward and to the right and passes through the point with coordinates 1 comma 1.

The figure shows the graph of a curve in the first quadrant of the x y coordinate plane, with origin labeled O. The number 1 is shown on both axes. The curve has the behavior of a portion of an upward opening parabola with vertex at the point with coordinates 1 comma 1.

The figure shows the graph of a curve in the first quadrant of the x y coordinate plane, with origin labeled O. The number 1 is shown on both axes. The curve begins just to the right of the y axis, just below y equals 1. The curve is concave down and moves upward and to the right at first. It levels off and becomes horizontal at the point with coordinates 1 comma 1. From here, the graph is concave up and moves upward and to the right until it ends.

The figure shows the graph of a curve in the first quadrant of the x y coordinate plane, with origin labeled O. The number 1 is shown on both axes. The curve has the behavior of a portion of a downward opening parabola with vertex at the point with coordinates 1 comma 1.

content.answer: The figure shows the graph of a curve in the first quadrant of the x y coordinate plane, with origin labeled O. The number 1 is shown on both axes. The curve has the behavior of a portion of an upward opening parabola with vertex at the point with coordinates 1 comma 1.

skill.text: Skill 3.G: Confirm that solutions are accurate and appropriate.
